tasks.title: Migrate solution to .NET 8 and introduce Dependency Injection
tasks.description:
Goal: move from .NET Framework 4.x to .NET 8 WinForms (nullable enabled).

### Steps
1. Edit BitcoinFinder.csproj → <TargetFramework>net8.0-windows10.0.19041.0</TargetFramework>.
2. Upgrade NuGet packages (NBitcoin ≥ 8.0, etc.).
3. Replace static singletons with Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.
4. Fix all nullable warnings until `dotnet build` is clean.
5. Ensure AnyCPU & x64 configs run via `dotnet run`.
